front.title: Creation and Use of Email Feedback Reports: An Applicability Statement for the Abuse Reporting Format (ARF)

abstract.t: RFC 5965 defines an extensible, machine-readable format intended for mail operators to report feedback about received email to other parties. This document describes one common method for utilizing this format for reporting at scale between large mailbox providers, and from large mailbox providers to other mail sending entities. [NOTE TO EDITOR: Murray Kucherawy is listed as an author only to enable him to complete the publication process on behalf of J.D. Falk. Please remove Murray from the author list prior to publication.]
